attributes.action: Stop 'Open Society Foundation' influence within the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Tip of Iceberg:

UK - Cash for MPs 
https://www.telegraph.co.uk/politics/2018/02/07/george-soros-man-broke-bank-england-backing-secret-plot-thwart/

Social Media - Facebook
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4041910/Clinton-mega-donor-George-Soros-leads-line-liberal-billionaires-funding-Facebook-s-fake-news-fact-checker.html

Italy - Migrant-driven Social Engineering 
http://themillenniumreport.com/2017/07/soros-sponsored-immigration-network-in-italy/

I have dozens more references.
attributes.background: This wealthy private organisation is not transparent to political or consumer bodies yet has wielded political, financial, media, thinktank, NGO, and educational influence upon numerous national societies, detrimentally, with impunity. UK society needs protection from clandestine social engineering.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
